parameters.name: EndpointId
parameters.description: The ID of the outbound endpoint.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword for the name of the forwarding rule. The search is case-insensitive and supports fuzzy match.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en

parameters.name: NeedDetailAttributes
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the list of virtual private clouds (VPCs) that are associated with the forwarding rule. Valid values:

- true: returns the list.

- false: does not return the list.

Default value: false.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The start value is 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20.
